directions: Mix the tomatoes, onion, white beans, chili beans, taco seasoning mix, and ranch dressing mix in a large pot over medium heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, mix in the burger crumbles, and continue cooking until heated through. Top with cheese to serve.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice
1 (15 ounce) can chili beans, with liquid
1 (1.25 ounce) package reduced sodium taco seasoning mix
title: Unbelievably Easy and Delicious Vegetarian Chili
